coordination_meta.purpose: Create unified prompt engineering framework design from research insights

agents.name: Minimal CLAUDE.md Design Specialist
agents.mission: Create optimal CLAUDE.md structure (200-400 lines) with @ imports, modular structure, Claude Code native patterns, and community best practices

deliverables.name: S01-minimal-claude-md-design.md
deliverables.description: Optimal CLAUDE.md structure with @ imports and modular architecture
key_achievements: 300-400 line CLAUDE.md design with 80% token reduction

agents.name: Prompt Engineering Architecture Specialist
agents.mission: Design comprehensive PE modules: .claude/prompt-engineering/ structure, architectural constraints, testing mandate integration, security-first components

deliverables.name: S02-prompt-engineering-architecture.md
deliverables.description: Comprehensive prompt engineering module architecture design
key_achievements: TDD mandate integration with behavioral validation

agents.name: Command Consolidation Specialist
agents.mission: Optimize command structure: consolidate 17 commands to essential 8-10, design parameterized patterns, create categories (dev/, test/, ops/), integrate with native Claude Code

deliverables.name: S03-command-consolidation-design.md
deliverables.description: Optimized command structure with essential commands and parameterized patterns
key_achievements: Consolidated 17 commands to 9 core commands (47% reduction)
Categorized structure (dev/, ops/, setup/, meta/, docs/)
Full backward compatibility with alias system

agents.name: Module Reorganization Specialist
agents.mission: Design optimal module structure: clean .claude/modules/ hierarchy, clear interfaces, dependency management, single responsibility principle

deliverables.name: S04-module-reorganization-design.md
deliverables.description: Optimal module hierarchy with clear interfaces and dependency management
key_achievements: Clean 6-category module hierarchy with single responsibility
Standardized interface contracts across all modules
Acyclic dependency management with clear layers

agents.name: Native Feature Integration Specialist
agents.mission: Maximize Claude Code capabilities: parallel tool execution patterns, hierarchical memory structure, Task() subagent orchestration, context management optimization

deliverables.name: S05-native-feature-integration.md
deliverables.description: Claude Code native capabilities integration and optimization patterns

success_criteria: Clean modular architecture with single responsibility
Full Claude Code native feature integration

final_deliverable.name: UNIFIED-FRAMEWORK-SYNTHESIS-REPORT.md
final_deliverable.description: Comprehensive unified framework design with all agent specifications integrated

coordination_rules.quality_standards: SYNTHESIS EXCELLENCE - Unified design from research insights
coordination_rules.cross_agent_coordination: ensure design consistency across all components
coordination_rules.integration_focus: unified framework that leverages all research findings

key_achievements: 80% token reduction through optimal CLAUDE.md design
